text: -miqdamasmiq tat tEq pradA$syAqmItiq tvI(3) itya#bravIth saqndhAM tu sanda#dhAvahaiq tvAmEqva pravi#SAqnItiq yanmAM pra#viqSEH kiM mA# Bu~jjyAq itya#bravIqt tvAmEqvEndhI#yaq tavaq BOgA#yaq tvAM pravi#SEyaqmitya#bravIqt taM ~MvRuqtraH prAvi#SaduqdaraqM ~Mvai vRuqtraH kShut Kaluq vai ma#nuqShya#syaq BrAtRu#vyOq ya - [  ]  41
